Package controller

Class WishlistItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.WishlistItemController
  • @CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("api/expense-management")
public class WishlistItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    The REST Controller responsible for exposing the endpoints related to managing the wishlist: - add-wishlistItem - get-wishlist-items - purchase-wishlist-item - delete-wishlist-item - find-products

    • Constructor Summary

      • create

        @PostMapping("/add-wishlistItem")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> create​(@RequestBody
                                                         WishlistItemDto wishlistItemDto,
                                                         @RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                         java.lang.String bearerToken)
        Add a wishlist item Method: POST Requires Authorization header Requires Content-Type: application/json header
        Parameters:
        wishlistItemDto - the wishlist item to be saved
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header
        Returns:
        the wishlist item if successful, or an error message otherwise

      • purchaseWishlistItem

        @PostMapping("/purchase-wishlist-item/{wishlistItemId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> purchaseWishlistItem​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                                       java.lang.String bearerToken,
                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                       int wishlistItemId,
                                                                       @RequestBody
                                                                       ExpenseDto expenseDto)
        Delete a wishlist item and adds an expense instead Requires Authorization header
        Parameters:
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header
        wishlistItemId - the id of the wishlist item to be purchased
        expenseDto - the expense to be added
        Returns:
        the added expense

                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                     int wishlistItemId)

        wishlistItemId - the id of the wishlist item to be deleted
        Returns:

      • findProducts

        @GetMapping("/find-products")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> findProducts​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                               java.lang.String bearerToken,
                                                               @RequestParam
                                                               java.lang.String keyword,
                                                               @RequestParam
                                                               java.lang.String vendor)
        Search for products by keyword and vendor Requires Authorization header
        Parameters:
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header
        keyword - the keyword for filtering the products
        vendor - the vendor where to look for the products
        Returns:
        a collection of WishlistItemViewModel, each representing a product
